Checks if a given string is empty.
checkExists(String, String, String) - Method in class database.InputControl
checks if a given value already exists inside a table, if it exists an errormessage is generated This errormessage can later be aquired from the errormessage list using the name you used here.

Connection - Class in database
This connection class houses the Cache database connection and other capabilities that correspond directly to this connection.

The constructor opens the loger and instantiates the connection object It also opens the file handler for the logger.
createConnection() - Method in class database.Connection
Creates a connection, You can get a reference to this connection trough the getConnection function.
